CommandError: An error occurred while executing the command!

FnCommand.NoLink:
You have not yet linked your account to a player name!
Use **!fn link <PlayerName>**
If you want general help, use **!fn help**!
FnCommand.NoLTStats: This player has no lifetime stats
FnCommand.UserHelp:
`!fn` **-** .
`!fn <Spieler Name>` **-** Display the stats of your account.
`!fn ps4 <Spieler Name>` **-** Display the **PS4** stats of your account
`!fn xbox <Spieler Name>` **-** Display the **XBox** stats of your account.
`!fn help` **-** Show this help.
`!fn info` **-** Show general Informaion and stats about this bot.
`!fn rdm name` **-** Display a random Spot.
`!fn rdm loc` **-** Display a random POI¹.
`!fn map` **-** Display the current Fortnite Map.
`!fn status` **-** Display the current Fortnite server status
`!fn link <Platform> <SpielerName>` **-** Verlinke deinen Account mit dem Bot für eine


¹ - POI heißt **P**oin **o**f **I**nterest. Es sind beliebte bzw. bekannte Orte.
~~---------------------------------------------~~

FnCommand.MentionMessage:
Did I hear my name there? :thinking:

You need help?
Just use `!fn help` and all your problems are solved! :innocent:
FnCommand.DonateMessage:
You want to support me?

Just get on [this Discord Server](https://discord.gg/Sw5RbXD). Write me (Luc1412#0897) an direct message and say, that you want donate.
FnCommand.VoteMessage:

 Gehe einfach auf [diese Webseite](https://discordbots.org/bot/444203099331231746) und klicke auf Vote.
